data.name: Player & Partner character "Daiyosei" / 玩家角色＋同伴「大妖精」 / プレイヤー & パートナーキャラ「大妖精」 (Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-)
data.detailed_description:
Adds the following content to Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-.

Player character
･Daiyosei

Partner character
･Daiyosei

Equipments
･Phantom Seek

Spell Cards
･Fay Quartet, "Four Fairies"
･Grace, "All-Weather Fairy"

[Attention]
Playable characters could be used from the start for those dungeons without story. They could also be used in dungeon with a story after it is cleared.
Partners could be used freely from the start.

data.short_description: Adds the player character "Daiyosei" to Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-.

fullgame.name: Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded- / 不可思议的幻想乡TOD -RELOADED- / 不思議の幻想郷TOD -RELOADED-

*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimi:
  • Richiede un processore e un sistema operativo a 64 bit
  • Sistema operativo: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 64bit
  • Processore: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memoria: 4 GB di RAM
  • Scheda video: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Versione 11
  • Memoria: 10 GB di spazio disponibile
  • Scheda audio: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Consigliati:
  • Richiede un processore e un sistema operativo a 64 bit
  • Sistema operativo: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 64bit
  • Processore: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K
  • Memoria: 8 GB di RAM
  • Scheda video: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 VRAM 3GB+
  • DirectX: Versione 11
  • Memoria: 10 GB di spazio disponibile
  • Scheda audio: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
